playground.title: Playground
playground.confirmReset:
Are you sure that you want to reset the world?
This CANNOT be undone.

errorDialog.title: Opps, an error has occured.
errorDialog.infoCodeEditor: Your code editor may give you addtional information.
errorDialog.detailedConsole: Detailed error information is in the browser console. Press F12 to see it.

suggestions.TypeError_NotAFunc: Have you typed your function name correctly? Maybe you want to have a look of our {0}
suggestions.TypeError_AssignConstVar: Once you declare a variable as constant, you cannot change its value. {0}
suggestions.RefError_VarNotDefined: Did you typed your variable or function name correctly? Or have you declared the variable before you use it? {0}
suggestions.SyxError_UnexpToken: Check your code and find that typo! {0}
suggestions.GameLogicError: Look at your world and consider you code logic again! {0}

GameKernalError.text: This does not occur that often. If you have seen this and believe it is a bug, consider {0} The error itself could still contain useful information.

suggestions.fallback: Though we cannot give you much advice this time, it is always encouraged to do some research on google and find the solution yourself. {0}

coding.title: Coding
coding.confirmReset:
Are you sure that you want to reset the editor?
This CANNOT be undone.

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.opt1: I have not learned programming, or
beginner.opt2: I don't understand object-oriented programming, or

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.opt1: I have learned at least one programming language, or
advanced.opt2: I have a basic understanding of javascript, or
advanced.opt3: I want to have more challenge...

1.title: Where it all starts
1.description: This is the playground page. Here you can run your code and see how the kara moves. Also, you can put game objects on the world.

2.title: Name your own world
2.description: You are able to give your world a name. This name will be used when you export your code and world.

3.title: See your world
3.description: This is the world. Try to drag the kara on a block!

4.title: Delete something
4.description: To remove any object from your world, just right click on it.

5.title: Test it
5.description: Clicking this button will execute the code you written in the Coding page. But now, let's go to the Coding page and write something awesome!

1.description: This is the coding editor. By writing javascript code, you will be able to control kara to do almost everything. So, be creative!

2.title: And a lot more
2.description:
To let kara move: kara.move()
For more methods, see full references here.

3.title: Time to go back
3.description: After you finished writing your code, it's time to test it! Go to the Playground page and click the Run button we discussed before.

1.title: The end of the beginning
1.description: Finally, we are at the end of our tour. Click the Run button, and look how kara moves.
